metadata.synopsis: Patron chatter in Elfsong Tavern - Blevindall.

0.speaker: Blevindall
0.text: Some folks are upset the Elfsong is out of their signature plum prosecco, but I can't stomach it. Dreadful stuff.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Blevindall
1.text: Alan Alyth finally managed to rent out his whole upper floor, I hear. Maybe now he'll be able to afford to get it renovated. So shabby!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

2.speaker: Blevindall
2.text: They have lovely dessert drinks here, but I'm giving them a pass. Must stay slim and trim!
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

3.speaker: Blevindall
3.text: I would love to have seen Gortash's coronation, but I would have to have skipped the after feast - I'm on a strict diet.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

4.speaker: Blevindall
4.text: If Lorroakan had been trim from the Waterdeep water diet, I wager things would have gone differently for him.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

5.speaker: Blevindall
5.text: The rumour is that Lord Gortash is dead! It couldn't have been his health, he didn't look an ounce overweight.

6.speaker: Blevindall
6.text: I hear Rolan's got a pretty cute little brother, too. I wonder how late the Sundries is open today?
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

7.speaker: Blevindall
7.text: Just look at you! So tasty!
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

8.speaker: Blevindall
8.text: I read that young mage Rolan is the new manager of Sorcerous Sundries! I don't usually go for the horned type, but, oh my!
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

9.speaker: Blevindall
9.text: You must have heard the big explosion from the harbour! I felt it right down in my... you know.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

10.speaker: Blevindall
10.text: I understand that you're the one who rented out the upstairs! Forget I said anything.
10.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

11.speaker: Blevindall
11.text: I know some people were afraid of them, but I loved looking at those Steel Watchers marching around the city. So strong and athletic. Made me feel safe.

12.speaker: Blevindall
12.text: I've seen that Lorroakan in here, stuffing his face with pastries! I bet he was just too slow to dodge whatever it was that got him.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

13.speaker: Blevindall
13.text: I'm on the Waterdeep water diet, you know: twelve bottles of pure aqua per day!
13.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

14.speaker: Blevindall
14.text: I'm not surprised anyone as trim and fit as you has such a good reputation. Yum!
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

15.speaker: Blevindall
15.text: I hope whatever happened in the harbour will clear out those nasty sahuagin! I want to show off my cute new bathing wear.
15.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

16.speaker: Blevindall
16.text: With the Steel Watchers gone, who will protect us from the bugbears and goblins?

17.speaker: Blevindall
17.text: I guess if death can come for Gortash, it can come for any of us, eh?
